project_objectives: ENV623 is a project for monitoring wildlife near the Skukuza camp in southwestern Kruger National Park. Cameras are deployed annually during the wet season for approximately two weeks.
data_citation: Chen, H.. 2025. Last updated April 2025. ENV623. http://n2t.net/ark:/63614/w12009198. Accessed via wildlifeinsights.org on 2025-04-13.
